name: Piano Game Prototype
description:
Learn to read music - The FUN way!

Play the piano, practice your notes, and even quiz yourself in a speed round game as you learn to read music, one note at a time. Easy to pick up for the beginner or the long time veteran, everyone can experience the joys of reading and playing music in this game built for future musicians!

-This game is in Indefinite Beta.

Everything except background music and images by: Noah Schultz
